remarks: Alternate definition of indexed intersection when ` B ` is a set. Definition 15(b) of [Suppes] p. 44.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jun-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
statement:
dfiun2.1 $e |- B e. _V $.
dfiin2 $p |- |^|_ x e. A B = |^| { y | E. x e. A y = B } $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d x y $.
